だからStepping now ワタシスピードで！\r\n: That's why I'm stepping now at my speed!
生きとし生ける人は皆々 悩むようにできてる\r\n: Every living person is made to suffer hardships
なんだこれは！？（なんなんだこれは！？）\r\n:
What the heck is up with that!?
(Wha-what the heck is up with that!?)
なんだか難しそうだけど やるぞスタンバイ！\r\n: It sounds kind of difficult, but I'll do it, stand by!
壁は昇るか？穴を空けるか？抜け道を探すか？\r\n: Will you climb the wall? Make a hole? Or look for a way around?
自分でちゃんと考えたのなら！\r\n: As long as you've thought it through for yourself!
振りのポーズが全然キマらない\r\n: I can't seem to land the right pose
歌のピッチもちっとも合わない\r\n: And I can't sing on pitch at all
負けないぞ 敵は自分自身\r\n: I'm not gotta lose, my foe is myself,
昨日よりも素敵な私を目指すの\r\n: and I'm gotta be a better person than I was before
目指した先で キラキラステージの幕が開く\r\n: The curtain opens on the sparkling stage I'm aiming for
高まるぞ！ぜったい いっぱい 輝け！\r\n: Rise up! Absolutely shine to the fullest!
そう君が 勇気をさ 元気をさ くれたんだよ\r\n: Yes, you gave me courage, you gave me strength,
何度も何度も何度もありがとう！\r\n: thank you, thank you, thank you again and again!
「できる！」って走りだそう\r\n: "I can do this!", I'll start to run
失敗したっていいんだよ 学びのチャンス\r\n: It's okay to fail, it's a chance to learn
まだまだ伸びしろあります\r\n: I still have room to grow
そんな感じでCampus modeは無限大まで！\r\n: that's how Campus mode works up to infinity!
信じたら ぜったい いっぱい 輝け！\r\n: When you believe in me, I can absolutely shine to the fullest!
だからCampus modeで もういっちょ！\r\n: So let's go in Campus Mode one more time!
yeah yeah yeah 続けCampus road\r\n: yeah yeah yeah, continue on the Campus road
wow wow wow 行くぞCampus mode\r\n: wow wow wow, let's go, Campus mode
